å¿ƒè¡€æ¥æ½®çš„ä¸€æ³¢ï¼Œè®°å½•æ“ä½œå¹¶è¿˜åŸæ“ä½œï¼Œå¯ç”¨çš„åœºæ™¯è¯´ä¸å®šè¿˜æŒºå¤šã€‚

## å‰æœŸå‡†å¤‡

ä½¿ç”¨pynputå°±å¯ä»¥å®Œç¾çš„å®ç°ä¸Šé¢éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œè€Œä¸”ç”¨ç€è¿˜æŒºç®€å•ï¼›

## å…·ä½“å®ç°

``` python
import time
import json
import random
import threading
import pynput


class MouseRecord(object):
    """
    è®°å½•é”®ç›˜é¼ æ ‡äº‹ä»¶å€¼jsonæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œ
    åŒ…æ‹¬é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œæ»šåŠ¨ï¼Œå·¦å³é”®
    é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹ï¼Œæ”¾å¼€
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.start_time = 0
        self.mouse_list = []
        self.running = True
        self.save_file = "mouselist.json"

    def get_time(self):
        return time.time() - self.start_time

    def on_click(self, x, y, button, pressed):
        """
        clickäº‹ä»¶
        """
        if not self.running:
            return False
        if not pressed:
            return True
        self.mouse_list.append({
            "opera": "click",
            "posix": x,
            "posiy": y,
            "button": str(button),
            "stime": self.get_time()
        })
        print(x, y, button, pressed)

    def on_move(self, x, y):
        """
        é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶ï¼ŒåŠ ä¸ªéšæœºå‡å°‘å­˜å‚¨
        """
        if random.randint(0, 2) == 1:
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "move",
                "posix": x,
                "posiy": y,
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def on_scroll(self, x, y, dx, dy):
        """
        é¼ æ ‡æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse_list.append({
            "opera": "scroll",
            "posix": x,
            "posiy": y,
            "scrollx": dx,
            "scrolly": dy,
            "stime": self.get_time()
        })

    def on_key_press(self, key):
        """
        é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œæ­£å¸¸å»ºæ˜¯ç›´æ¥å±•ç¤ºå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œç‰¹æ®Šé”®ä¼šè¿”å›Key.xxx
        æŒ‰ä¸‹escçš„æ—¶å€™é€€å‡ºç›‘å¬
        """
        if key == pynput.keyboard.Key.esc:
            self.running = False
            mouse = pynput.mouse.Controller()
            mouse.click(pynput.mouse.Button.left)
            return self.running
        if str(key) != "<0>":
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "press",
                "key": str(key).strip("'"),
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def on_key_release(self, key):
        """
        é”®ç›˜é‡Šæ”¾äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if str(key) != "<0>":
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "release",
                "key": str(key).strip("'"),
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def mouse_listen(self):
        """
        å¼€å¯é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬
        """
        with pynput.mouse.Listener(on_move=self.on_move, on_click=self.on_click, on_scroll=self.on_scroll) as listener:
            listener.join()

    def key_listen(self):
        """
        å¼€å¯é”®ç›˜ç›‘å¬
        """
        with pynput.keyboard.Listener(on_press=self.on_key_press, on_release=self.on_key_release) as listener:
            listener.join()

    def run(self):
        """
        è¿è¡Œç›‘å¬ï¼Œç»“æŸåä¿å­˜ä¸ºjsonæ–‡ä»¶
        """
        self.start_time = time.time()
        t1 = threading.Thread(target=self.mouse_listen)
        t2 = threading.Thread(target=self.key_listen)
        t1.start()
        t2.start()
        t1.join()
        t2.join()
        print(json.dumps(self.mouse_list), file=open(self.save_file, "w"))


class MouseRecover(object):
    """
    è¿˜åŸé”®ç›˜é¼ æ ‡äº‹ä»¶
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.start_time = 0
        self.mouse = pynput.mouse.Controller()
        self.keyboard = pynput.keyboard.Controller()
        self.buttons = {
            "Button.left": pynput.mouse.Button.left,
            "Button.right": pynput.mouse.Button.right
        }
        self.read_file = "mouselist.json"

    def deal_click(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))
        time.sleep(0.1)
        self.mouse.click(self.buttons.get(record.get("button")))

    def deal_move(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))

    def deal_scroll(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))
        self.mouse.scroll(record.get("scrollx"), record.get("scrolly"))

    def deal_key_press(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if record.get("key").startswith("Key"):
            self.keyboard.press(eval(record.get("key"), {}, {
                "Key": pynput.keyboard.Key
            }))
        else:
            self.keyboard.press(record.get("key"))

    def deal_key_release(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é”®ç›˜é‡Šæ”¾äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if record.get("key").startswith("Key"):
            self.keyboard.release(eval(record.get("key"), {}, {
                "Key": pynput.keyboard.Key
            }))
        else:
            self.keyboard.release(record.get("key"))

    def run(self):
        """
        è¯»å–jsonæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œäº‹ä»¶
        """
        data = json.load(open(self.read_file, "r"))
        for item in data:
            if item.get("opera") == "click":
                self.deal_click(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "move":
                self.deal_move(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "scroll":
                self.deal_scroll(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "press":
                self.deal_key_press(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "release":
                self.deal_key_release(item)
            time.sleep(item.get("stime") - self.start_time)
            self.start_time = item.get("stime")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    #è®°å½•äº‹ä»¶
    t = MouseRecord()
    t.run()

    # è¿è¡Œäº‹ä»¶
    # tt = MouseRecover()
    # tt.run()
```

        self.save_file = "mouselist.json"

    def get_time(self):
        return time.time() - self.start_time

    def on_click(self, x, y, button, pressed):
        """
        clickäº‹ä»¶
        """
        if not self.running:
            return False
        if not pressed:
            return True
        self.mouse_list.append({
            "opera": "click",
            "posix": x,
            "posiy": y,
            "button": str(button),
            "stime": self.get_time()
        })
        print(x, y, button, pressed)

    def on_move(self, x, y):
        """
        é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶ï¼ŒåŠ ä¸ªéšæœºå‡å°‘å­˜å‚¨
        """
        if random.randint(0, 2) == 1:
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "move",
                "posix": x,
                "posiy": y,
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def on_scroll(self, x, y, dx, dy):
        """
        é¼ æ ‡æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse_list.append({
            "opera": "scroll",
            "posix": x,
            "posiy": y,
            "scrollx": dx,
            "scrolly": dy,
            "stime": self.get_time()
        })

    def on_key_press(self, key):
        """
        é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œæ­£å¸¸å»ºæ˜¯ç›´æ¥å±•ç¤ºå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œç‰¹æ®Šé”®ä¼šè¿”å›Key.xxx
        æŒ‰ä¸‹escçš„æ—¶å€™é€€å‡ºç›‘å¬
        """
        if key == pynput.keyboard.Key.esc:
            self.running = False
            mouse = pynput.mouse.Controller()
            mouse.click(pynput.mouse.Button.left)
            return self.running
        if str(key) != "<0>":
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "press",
                "key": str(key).strip("'"),
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def on_key_release(self, key):
        """
        é”®ç›˜é‡Šæ”¾äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if str(key) != "<0>":
            self.mouse_list.append({
                "opera": "release",
                "key": str(key).strip("'"),
                "stime": self.get_time()
            })

    def mouse_listen(self):
        """
        å¼€å¯é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬
        """
        with pynput.mouse.Listener(on_move=self.on_move, on_click=self.on_click, on_scroll=self.on_scroll) as listener:
            listener.join()

    def key_listen(self):
        """
        å¼€å¯é”®ç›˜ç›‘å¬
        """
        with pynput.keyboard.Listener(on_press=self.on_key_press, on_release=self.on_key_release) as listener:
            listener.join()

    def run(self):
        """
        è¿è¡Œç›‘å¬ï¼Œç»“æŸåä¿å­˜ä¸ºjsonæ–‡ä»¶
        """
        self.start_time = time.time()
        t1 = threading.Thread(target=self.mouse_listen)
        t2 = threading.Thread(target=self.key_listen)
        t1.start()
        t2.start()
        t1.join()
        t2.join()
        print(json.dumps(self.mouse_list), file=open(self.save_file, "w"))


class MouseRecover(object):
    """
    è¿˜åŸé”®ç›˜é¼ æ ‡äº‹ä»¶
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.start_time = 0
        self.mouse = pynput.mouse.Controller()
        self.keyboard = pynput.keyboard.Controller()
        self.buttons = {
            "Button.left": pynput.mouse.Button.left,
            "Button.right": pynput.mouse.Button.right
        }
        self.read_file = "mouselist.json"

    def deal_click(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))
        time.sleep(0.1)
        self.mouse.click(self.buttons.get(record.get("button")))

    def deal_move(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))

    def deal_scroll(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
        """
        self.mouse.position = (record.get("posix"), record.get("posiy"))
        self.mouse.scroll(record.get("scrollx"), record.get("scrolly"))

    def deal_key_press(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if record.get("key").startswith("Key"):
            self.keyboard.press(eval(record.get("key"), {}, {
                "Key": pynput.keyboard.Key
            }))
        else:
            self.keyboard.press(record.get("key"))

    def deal_key_release(self, record):
        """
        å¤„ç†é”®ç›˜é‡Šæ”¾äº‹ä»¶
        """
        if record.get("key").startswith("Key"):
            self.keyboard.release(eval(record.get("key"), {}, {
                "Key": pynput.keyboard.Key
            }))
        else:
            self.keyboard.release(record.get("key"))

    def run(self):
        """
        è¯»å–jsonæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œäº‹ä»¶
        """
        data = json.load(open(self.read_file, "r"))
        for item in data:
            if item.get("opera") == "click":
                self.deal_click(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "move":
                self.deal_move(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "scroll":
                self.deal_scroll(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "press":
                self.deal_key_press(item)
            if item.get("opera") == "release":
                self.deal_key_release(item)
            time.sleep(item.get("stime") - self.start_time)
            self.start_time = item.get("stime")


if __name__ == "__main__":
